snippet: Governor JOHNSTON was in this County last week and spoke on Saturday to large crowds at Friendsville and Montrose. The host spirit prevails among our friends in this part of the State, and large gains are promised in the northern tier of Counties....

byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: Governor JOHNSTON was in this County last week and spoke on Saturday to large crowds at Friendsville and Montrose. The host spirit prevails among our friends in this part of the State, and large gains are promised in the northern tier of Counties. The Governor is bearing himself most gallantly, and making troops of friends wherever he goes.

headline.main: PENNSYLVANIA.; Gov. Johnston in Western Pennsylvanlia.
